document_data.title: Boltsmelter's Book
document_data.editor: [[Claire Hoffman]], [[Chris Tulach]], [[Travis Woodall]]{{Cite adventurers league/Boltsmelter's Book|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Boltsmelter's Book''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Elemental Evil|Elemental Evil]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Mulmaster]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''A dwarven expedition has stopped in Mulmaster for much-needed supplies. Furgis Boltsmelter, their founder and leader, is looking for some "no questions asked" protection for the duration of his stay in the city. Whatever he is trying to protect may not stay hidden for long. Can you keep his secret treasure out of the wrong hands?''|}}
